name: AVCaptionRegion.DisplayAlignment
desc: Constants that indicate the alignment of lines in a region.

items.name: case before
items.desc: An alignment that positions lines at the top of the block progression direction.

items.name: case center
items.desc: An alignment that positions lines in the middle of the block progression direction.

items.name: case after
items.desc: An alignment that positions lines at the bottom of the block progression direction.
